appDesc.message: Plagiarisma is the world famous plagiarism checker for scholars, students, teachers, writers.

appSelect.message: Select any text on the screen and press the button when it becomes active.

appSkip.message: Could not process on this tab.

appChars.message: Input query must contain at least 30 chars!

appProcess.message: Your request was processed successfully! You may continue your work. The results will appear in a new tab.

appKey.message: To find your API key, please log in to your Plagiarisma account or register a new one.
